name: ymlluo/laravel-ueditor
description: :baidu ueditor server side for laravel,power by filesystems,support OSS,Qiniu,COS,AWSs3 etc

suggest.league/flysystem: Required to use the Flysystem local and FTP drivers (^1.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Required to use the Flysystem S3 driver (^1.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-cached-adapter: Required to use the Flysystem cache (^1.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-sftp: Required to use the Flysystem SFTP driver (^1.0).
suggest.psr/http-message: Required to allow Storage::put to accept a StreamInterface (^1.0)
suggest.jacobcyl/ali-oss-storage: Required to use the Flysystem Aliyun OSS  driver (^2.1).
suggest.overtrue/laravel-filesystem-qiniu: Required to use the Flysystem QiNiu driver (^1.0).
suggest.freyo/flysystem-qcloud-cos-v5: Required to use the Tencent COS driver (^1.4)
